summary:
How can I make my Django app extensible so it can be used beyond my
original intent and gain wider adoption? Come learn how Eldarion has
been making their apps extensible for greater reuse as well as wider
adoption.

Help us caption & translate this video!

http://amara.org/v/FPWk/

Help us caption & translate this video!

http://amara.org/v/FSPI/
title: Patterns for Extensibility
